history.proof: intros p n H. induction H. - constructor. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros p n H. induction H. - constructor. - destruct a as [a la ls]. constructor. + apply IHpl_tl_length. + auto. - constructor. + auto. + apply IHpl_tl_length.
